action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Tax Fairness for Americans Abroad Act of 2018
This bill allow certain U.S. citizens who are residents of foreign countries to elect to use an alternative tax exclusion for foreign source income, which expands the foreign source income that may be excluded from gross income for tax purposes.
